ERROR_UNKNOWN.en: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
ERROR_UNKNOWN.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

OTP_SMS_NO_PHONE_FOUND.en: You need to register a mobile phone on this account if you want to verify by text message.
OTP_SMS_NO_PHONE_FOUND.cy: Mae angen i chi gofrestru ffôn symudol ar y cyfrif hwn os ydych am wirio drwy neges destun

OTP_NOT_VALID_SMS.en: Enter the security code exactly as it is shown in the text message
OTP_NOT_VALID_SMS.cy: Mewngofnodwch y cod diogelwch yn union fel y dangosir yn y neges destun

OTP_NOT_VALID_EMAIL.en: Enter the security code exactly as it is shown in the email
OTP_NOT_VALID_EMAIL.cy: Mewngofnodwch y cod diogelwch yn union fel y dangosir yn yr e-bost

OTP_CHOICE_EMAIL_TEXT_REQUIRED.en: Select how you want to get a security code
OTP_CHOICE_EMAIL_TEXT_REQUIRED.cy: Dewiswch sut rydych am gael eich cod diogelwch

SEND_MFA_SMS_ERROR.en: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
SEND_MFA_SMS_ERROR.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

SEND_MFA_EMAIL_ERROR.en: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
SEND_MFA_EMAIL_ERROR.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

PWD_POLICY_ERROR.en: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements
PWD_POLICY_ERROR.cy: Nid yw'ch cyfrinair yn cwrdd â gofynion y polisi cyfrinair

CHANGE_PASSWORD_CHARACTER_SET.en: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements
CHANGE_PASSWORD_CHARACTER_SET.cy: Nid yw'ch cyfrinair yn cwrdd â gofynion y polisi cyfrinair

RESET_PASSWORD_CHARACTER_SET.en: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements
RESET_PASSWORD_CHARACTER_SET.cy: Nid yw'ch cyfrinair yn cwrdd â gofynion y polisi cyfrinair

LENGTH_BASED.en: Your password must be at least ${min-password-length} characters
LENGTH_BASED.cy: Rhaid i'ch cyfrinair fod yn ${min-password-length} cymeriad o leiaf

CHARACTER_SET.en: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements
CHARACTER_SET.cy: Nid yw'ch cyfrinair yn cwrdd â gofynion y polisi cyfrinair

REPEATED_CHARACTERS.en: Your password can only contain a maximum of ${max-consecutive-length} identical characters in a row
REPEATED_CHARACTERS.cy: Uchafswm o ${max-consecutive-length} cymeriad union yr un peth yn olynol yn unig y gall eich cyfrinair ei gynnwys

ATTRIBUTE_VALUE.en: Your password cannot be your name or email address
ATTRIBUTE_VALUE.cy: Ni all eich cyfrinair bod yn eich enw neu eich cyfeiriad e-bost

DICTIONARY.en: Your password must be hard to guess
DICTIONARY.cy: Rhaid i'ch cyfrinair fod yn anodd ei ddyfalu

NO_ACTIVE_SESSION.cy: Rydych bellach wedi eich arwyddo allan

NOTIFY_JWT_BUILD_ERROR.en: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
NOTIFY_JWT_BUILD_ERROR.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

FOOTER_LICENCE_START.en: All content is available under the
FOOTER_LICENCE_START.cy: Mae'r holl gynnwys ar gael o dan

MISSING_CONFIRM_READ_ERROR.en: Select if you confirm that you have read and understood this information

COMPANY_FETCH_ERROR.en: Something went wrong. Enter the company number again.
COMPANY_FETCH_ERROR.cy: Aeth rhywbeth o'i le. Mewngofnodwch rif y cwmni eto

COMPANY_NOT_FOUND.en: Enter the correct company number and place the company was registered
COMPANY_NOT_FOUND.cy: Mewngofnodwch rif cywir y cwmni a'r lle y cofrestrwyd y cwmni

COMPANY_NOT_ACTIVE.en: You must enter a company number for a company that is active
COMPANY_NOT_ACTIVE.cy: Mae’n rhaid chi mewngofnodi rif cwmni ar gyfer cwmni sy'n weithredol

COMPANY_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED.en: This user is already authorised to file for ${company.name}
COMPANY_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED.cy: Mae'r defnyddiwr hwn eisoes wedi'i awdurdodi i ffeilio ar gyfer ${company.name}

AUTH_CODE_NOT_DEFINED.en: Company must request an authentication code
AUTH_CODE_NOT_DEFINED.cy: Rhaid i’r Cwmni ofyn am god dilysu

AUTH_CODE_INACTIVE.en: Company must request an authentication code
AUTH_CODE_INACTIVE.cy: Rhaid i’r Cwmni ofyn am god dilysu

LOGIN_EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR.en: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
LOGIN_EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost yn y fformat cywir, fel enw@enghraifft.com

LOGIN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCOMPLETE.en: Please enter your email address and password
LOGIN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCOMPLETE.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir

UNKNOWN_EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR.en: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
UNKNOWN_EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost yn y fformat cywir, fel enw@enghraifft.com

UNKNOWN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCOMPLETE.en: Please enter your email address and password
UNKNOWN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCOMPLETE.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir

USER_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND.en: Enter a correct email address and password
USER_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir

USER_REMOVAL_FAILED.en: You must be fully authorised to remove another person’s authorisation to file online
USER_REMOVAL_FAILED.cy: Rhaid i chi gael eich awdurdodi'n llawn i gael gwared ar awdurdodiad person arall i ffeilio ar-lein

LOGIN_ACCOUNT_LOCKED_ERROR.en: You have entered incorrect details too many times. Your account is now locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes. You can reset your password if you've forgotten it.
LOGIN_ACCOUNT_LOCKED_ERROR.cy: Rydych wedi rhoi manylion anghywir i mewn gormod o weithiau. Mae eich cyfrif bellach wedi'i gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS.en: Enter a correct email address and password. You have ${remainingAttempts} attempts left.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir. Mae gennych ${remainingAttempts} cynnig ar ôl.

LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_LAST_ATTEMPT.en: Enter a correct email address and password. You have 1 attempts left. If the details you enter are incorrect again your account will be locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_LAST_ATTEMPT.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir. Mae gennych 1 cais ar ôl. Os yw'r manylion rydych yn mewngofnodi yn anghywir eto, bydd eich cyfrif yn cael ei gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_ERROR.en: You have entered incorrect details too many times. Your account is now locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_ERROR.cy: Rydych wedi rhoi manylion anghywir i mewn gormod o weithiau. Mae eich cyfrif bellach wedi'i gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

LOGIN_GENERAL_ERROR.en: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
LOGIN_GENERAL_ERROR.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

UNKNOWN_ACCOUNT_LOCKED_ERROR.cy: Rydych wedi rhoi manylion anghywir i mewn gormod o weithiau. Mae eich cyfrif bellach wedi'i gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS.en: Enter a correct email address and password. You have ${remainingAttempts} attempts left.
UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir. Mae gennych ${remainingAttempts} cynnig ar ôl.

UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_LAST_ATTEMPT.en: Enter a correct email address and password. You have 1 attempts left. If the details you enter are incorrect again your account will be locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_LAST_ATTEMPT.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost a chyfrinair cywir. Mae gennych 1 cais ar ôl. Os yw'r manylion rydych yn mewngofnodi yn anghywir eto, bydd eich cyfrif yn cael ei gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_ERROR.en: You have entered incorrect details too many times. Your account is now locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
UNKNOWN_SOFT_LOCK_ERROR.cy: Rydych wedi rhoi manylion anghywir i mewn gormod o weithiau. Mae eich cyfrif bellach wedi'i gloi ar gyfer ${softLockMinutes} munud.

UNKNOWN_GENERAL_ERROR.cy: Ymddiheuriadau, mae yna broblem gyda'r gwasanaeth

RESET_PASSWORD_REQUIRED(mail).cy: Mewngofnodwch y cyfeiriad e-bost a ddefnyddiwyd gennych i greu eich cyfrif WebFiling Tŷ'r Cwmnïau

CHANGE_EMAIL_INVALID_EMAIL_ERROR.cy: Mewngofnodwch gyfeiriad e-bost yn y fformat cywir, fel enw@enghraifft.com
